title: Ethereal Diamond & Gemstone Flower Haaram with Pearl Drops
materials: Crafted in 22K Yellow Gold. Adorned with brilliant-cut diamonds (SI clarity
vibrant green emeralds and lustrous freshwater pearls. Showcases the renowned Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine.
features: This exquisite Haaram features a delicate floral design motif along the necklace chain. Intricate filigree work surrounds each gemstone, emphasizing its sparkle. The setting ensures maximum light reflection for optimal brilliance, resulting in a truly captivating look.
colors: Primarily gold with the dazzling brilliance of diamonds. The focal point is the rich red of the ruby

occasions: or any grand celebration. It adds a touch of traditional elegance with a modern flair to your special moments.
description: This Haaram seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design with modern aesthetics. The brilliant-cut diamonds and colorful gemstones create a captivating contrast, making it a statement piece that will be treasured for generations. Its exceptional craftsmanship ensures durability, while its timeless design makes it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
